name: DarkMoon (Aerton)
description:
DarkMoon is the first game that I and my friend Polliana made in a game jam. The 4ª 99jam occurred in December/2017. You can see other games developed here: http://99lab.itch.io/

The jam's theme was "transformative education". Our first idea was to make a game about shooting books at persons, but we decided to not to make (sadly). But we had another idea, more close to the theme, where you don't transform people, but transform yourself into a positive person by fighting pessimism... on the Moon.

That's DarkMoon. You're on the Moon, you have to combat dark magic skeletons by shooting into their pessimism and converting into optimism. You only have a little time to do that.

Languages supported: English, Portuguese
